INT32 GPSdate

Detailed Description

Manipulate date stamps as used by NMEA / GPS.

NMEA date is reported as an int32 value in human-readable dd-mm-yy format (010100 to 311299) ... considering the age of NMEA there should be a rollover from 1999 to 2000 and maybe another from 2099 to 2100 but since this code is written in 2009/2010 neither of these should bother us!
